title: Can anyone identify this font for me?
content:
Hi, I am trying to find a certain font for a project with a tight deadline.

I’m looking for this font: [http://tinyurl.com/yg92lns](http://web.archive.org/web/20091029153809/http:/tinyurl.com/yg92lns "http://tinyurl.com/yg92lns")

Help from any font masters?

Much appreciated!
author: Mike Segawa
